name: Trangen (3D Game Engine)
description: Playable lightweight engine I have been working on. This is going to be used for the 4th game series and to remake the other three since I had issues developing all of them. I felt the need to make an engine to not only show off my programming skills. More than that though I feel like, in order to make the perfect game I would be personally happy with, I needed full control right down to the vertices. So, I have embarked on that process, these games WILL be nuts I can guarantee you that. Anyway trangen stands for trans engine, I will let you figure out what that means.
